fields.name: displaymandatoryfields
fields.fieldText:
Please enter Severity:"Critical"or "Major" or "Minor" & Priority in next screen to proceed further.


Severity: {!Problem.Severity__c}

Priority:{!Problem.Priority}

fields.name: usererrormessage
fields.fieldText: Creation of a Problem is not Possible until the Support Ticket is Assigned

fields.name: techmessageerrorscreen
fields.fieldText: Creation of a Problem is not Possible before Technical Analysis & Issue description are completed

fields.name: errorproductmessage
fields.fieldText: Creation of a Problem from this Case is not Possible as Product Information is missing

fields.name: ErrroMessgae
fields.fieldText: Something went wrong please contact your Key User, or try again

fields.name: productdtails
fields.fieldText:
Please note : Changes have to be done in the originating incident using the functionality "Update product details”


Product Name : {!Problem.CH_Product_Name__c}




Product Release: {!Problem.CH_Product_Release_Name__c}




Product Module : {!Problem.CH_Product_Module_Name__c}




Solution: {!Problem.CH_Solution_Name__c}




Product Variant: {!Problem.CH_Product_Variant_Name__c}

fields.name: productinformationvalue
fields.fieldText:
Please note :Product details set in the creation flow can be modified or completed into the problem after creation using the functionality "Update product details"


Product name : {!New_Problem_From_Product.Name}

fields.name: recordtypeeerrormessage
fields.fieldText:
Creation of a Problem is not Possible

﻿ from a Support Ticket of Type : {!Recordtypename}
